DOC.brief_summary: • To evaluate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics single intravenous dos WCK 5107 alone combination cefepime healthy adult human subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics WCK 5107 Alone Combination With Cefepime
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female , 1855 year age ( inclusive ) . 2 . Have body mass index 1830 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) calculate weight ( kg ) /height ( m2 ) . 3 . Medical history without major pathology/surgery last 6 month prior screen . 4 . Resting supine blood pressure 90139 ( systolic ) /4089 ( diastolic ) mmHg rest pulse rate 40100 beat per minute . 5 . Calculated creatinine clearance ≥80 mL/min 6 . Computerized 12lead ECG record without sign clinically significant pathology show clinically significant deviation judge Principal Investigator . 7 . Males willing use doublebarrier contraceptive measure donate sperm 90 day followup visit . 8 . Females pregnant breast feeding ( pregnancy confirm urine pregnancy test screen confirmation serum pregnancy test admission ) nonchildbearing potential screening . 9 . Females must either postmenopausal least 1 year , surgically sterile ( bilateral oophorectomy hysterectomy ) , practice 1 acceptable method birth control . 1 . History/evidence clinically relevant pathology . 2 . History clinically significant food drug allergy , include know hypersensitivity cefepime relate drug . 3 . A positive screen result drug abuse/alcohol admission study center . 4 . Use prescription medication ( exception oral contraceptive hormone replacement therapy ) include nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug sucralfate herbal preparation . 5 . Positive screen result hepatitis B , hepatitis C , human immunodeficiency virus screen . 6 . Any strenuous activity within 4 day prior admission study center . Strenuous define hard labor exercise outside subject 's usual behavior . 7 . History blood donation 500 mL last 2 month prior screen . 8 . Current use use tobacco nicotinecontaining product .
